title: The Real Megatron
detail: Robotic wide receiver that runs preprogrammed football routes to catch a thrown pass
extended_details: The robot will run a choice of pre-programmed routes so a quarterback can throw a football into a net that is attached to it.  When the ball is thrown, the bot will use computer vision to adjust it's route in order to catch the ball.
